attributes.action: Child maintenance needs to be based on Net pay not Gross pay.
attributes.additional_details: Many people are in financial hardship as their payments are based on what they earn before contributions making the amount payable completely unaffordable
attributes.background: Base child maintenance on Net pay after taxes and contributions

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Calculate child maintenance from net pay, not gross pay 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730665
